abstract: The government will hold a vast share of a restructured General Motors after it emerges from bankruptcy protection and provide G.M. with about $50 billion in financing so that it can reorganize, people with direct knowledge of the situation said Tuesday.
snippet: The government will hold a vast share of a restructured General Motors after it emerges from bankruptcy protection and provide G.M. with about $50 billion in financing so that it can reorganize, people with direct knowledge of the situation said T...
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:59 p.m. From Micheline Maynard, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: U.S. Expected to Own 70% of Restructured G.M.
